comment.author: 94563365@N00
comment._content:
A total of 13 points for the three tests comprising the event gave Pat McDonald of the New York A.C., Olympic and national champion with the sixteenpound shot, first prize in the all-around weight-throwing competition,\
ASBURY PARK, N.J., Aug. 26. -- Sergeant Patrick McDonald of the New York Police Department, Olympic weight-thrower and holder of the world's record for the thirty-five-pound weight throw, for the second time within a week rescued an unwary bather from the surf today.
